column4: how come lsusb shows my negatives scanner and xsane cant find it?
xsane might lack drivers for it. try vuescan.

its a grundig digital filmscanner(for negatives) cant find any drivers for it
in that case, i'm guessing for scanner is too old even for vuescan or broken
vuescan usually handles any scanner launched since the 90-ies
